director.name: 艾德里安·洛曼 Adriaan Lokman

introduction: VRThis captivating virtual reality experience transports users into a world entirely composed of air. Conceived as an interactive, three-dimensional painting, this immersive journey reveals the tangible presence of invisible elements. Through gentle movements, users float with the wind, exploring a woman’s transformative night of wanderings. When the dream-like experience concludes, the world undergoes a profound shift, forever changing its nature.
